TopicTitle: Guide to Setting Steam KSP to default to 64-bit w/ screenshots (For Windows and GNU/LInux)

Articles.Content:
album with captions
 

I'm having trouble embedding the album, but the album preview cut-off the captions anyway.

This works, thank you. Unfortunately, it requires the use of a shortcut somewhere. It does not actually allow you to click the Play button in Steam and for the default selection to be 64bit, and the second option below it to be 32bit. I don't believe there is anything anyone can do to change that, which sucks because that's what I really want to be fixed ...I prefer not to use shortcuts. I wish it'd revert back. When 1.1 first came out, this was the standard, and the default was 64bit. Something changed to make the default 32bit.
